input_text:
Job Title: Full-Stack Software Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Indigo Tech is a stealth-stage company building a new digital platform to help fitness and wellness businesses succeed with software, payments, and technology solutions. We are well-funded and backed by industry leaders. We value innovation, collaboration, and a results-driven mindset. Our team operates in a cloud-based environment leveraging the AWS (Amazon Web Services) platform.
The OpportunityWe have a unique opportunity for an experienced Full Stack Software Developer with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development. Your technical prowess, combined with a penchant for creating user-centric applications, will be vital as we design and refine our suite of SaaS products. If you have a passion for crafting optimal software solutions, familiarity with payment systems, and the desire to be a part of a high-performing team we would love to talk with you.
Key Responsibilities
Develop high-quality software design and architecture by studying information needs; conferring with users; studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; and investigating problem areas.Collaborate with the product design team to translate UI/UX elements from designer mock-ups to the actual code.Lead development of our front-end web application, back-end stack build out and integration with SaaS/PaaS frameworks.Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and reliability.Perform thorough testing to ensure robust functionality and minimal bugs.Deploy regular updates and patches as necessary, following best practices for software development lifecycles.Maintain a deep understanding of the latest industry trends and technology advancements to ensure our stack remains current.Collaborate with a diverse team of professionals to produce impeccable end-to-end results.
Your Qualifications
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.3+ years of proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role, with an extensive portfolio showcasing your expertise.Proficiency in fundamental front-end languages (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and popular frameworks (e.g., React, Vue).Solid expertise in back-end programming languages (e.g., Node.js, NestJS, Typescript, Python).Familiarity with AWS services and cloud-based solutions.Comprehensive understanding of databases (SQL and NoSQL), microservices, web servers, and UI/UX design.Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.Experience with payment systems is a plus.
The Work EnvironmentIndigo Tech is a remote-only company at this point. You will work from home in a very flexible, results-driven organization. We offer an unlimited vacation policy and competitive compensation and benefits. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment with a high level of autonomy this could be the right opportunity for you!We are an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity in all forms. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability, or any other unlawful factor.
We look forward to meeting you and discussing the future of our company together!

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Full-Stack Software Developer
output_json.summary: Experienced Full Stack Software Developer needed for Indigo Tech's digital platform.
job_responsibilities: Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and reliability
output_json.company_information: Indigo Tech is a stealth-stage company building a digital platform for fitness and wellness businesses. Well-funded and backed by industry leaders.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal-opportunity employer valuing diversity in all forms. No discrimination based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability, or any unlawful factor.
